item.description:
"Hope you all had a FABULOUS Thanksgiving and Happy Black Friday!


Tired of your family? Exhausted from shopping? Sick of small talk? Come laugh with us TONIGHT or TOMORROW!

That's right, the Bit Players WILL be hitting the stage to make you giggle away all the gobble you ate. Laughing burns calories, that is science and can't be denied so let us help you start working off some of that holiday weight that we all seem to accumulate!
Shows are at 8PM and are ALWAYS BYOB! Call (401) 849-3473 to reserve your seats!"

I love checking out comedy shows, but of course it's more fun to go with other people.  I just called, and they have about half the house to fill, so sounds like we can pay at the door, no need to make reservations.

Please actually RSVP (asap) if you want to go.  If not enough people (i.e. - 2 or 3 besides me) have RSVP'd by 2:00 Saturday, I'll reschedule for another time.

Looking forward to sharing some laughs, and don't forget, BYOB!    ~Erinn

 

p.s. - if you have any questions, feel free to text me at (734) eight91-78zero6
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be outside front door somewhere between 7:30 and 7:45.
item.name: Comedy Show!
